name: Evolution of Ages: Settlements
description: Evolutiuon of Ages is a game of managing resources in the ruins of our world. Recruit characters and level their skills and equipment from the stone age until the space age, while trying your best to avoid the very thing that led to our destruction previously.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Later Processor: 64 Bit (A limited 32 bit Client is available) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: WideScreen Recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 64 Bit Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Any
